mapper.select: SELECT LT.LEA_IDX, TM.TEAM_IDX, TM.TEAM_NAME, LT.LT_POINT, LT.LT_WIN, LT.LT_DRAW, LT.LT_LOSE, LT.LT_GOAL, LT.LT_LOSEPNT FROM SPO_TEAM TM, SPO_LEAGUETMM LT WHERE TM.TEAM_IDX=LT.TEAM_IDX AND LT.LEA_IDX = #{lea_Idx } ORDER BY LT.LT_POINT DESC

SELECT LE.LEA_IDX, LE.LEA_NAME, LE.LEA_CATE, LE.LEA_LOCAL, TM.TEAM_NAME, LE.LEA_INFO, LT.LT_STATUS FROM SPO_LEAGUE LE, SPO_LEAGUETM LT, SPO_TEAM TM WHERE LT.TEAM_IDX=TM.TEAM_IDX AND LE.LEA_IDX=LT.LEA_IDX AND TM.TEAM_IDX IN (SELECT TEAM_IDX FROM SPO_TMEM WHERE MEM_IDX = #{memIdx })
SELECT LEA_HOST, LEA_STYLE FROM SPO_LEAGUE WHERE LEA_IDX = #{lea_Idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE SPO_LEAGUETM SET LT_GROUP = #{lt_Group} WHERE TEAM_IDX = #{team_Idx} AND LEA_IDX = #{lea_Idx}
UPDATE SPO_LEAGUE SET LEA_STYLE = 'T' WHERE LEA_IDX = #{lea_Idx}
